scripts.test:nl: cross-env PROXY_GEO=Netherlands npx playwright test tests/prodReg.spec.ts --reporter=list
scripts.test:uk: cross-env PROXY_GEO=UnitedKingdom npx playwright test tests/prodReg.spec.ts --reporter=list
scripts.test:de: cross-env PROXY_GEO=Germany npx playwright test tests/prodReg.spec.ts --reporter=list
scripts.test:all: npm run test:nl && npm run test:uk && npm run test:de
